name: I'm on a watcher duty (Unity edition)
name_original: I'm on a watcher duty (Unity edition)
description:
This is a fangame of "I'm on observation duty" which originally created by Notovia (Zaster). This fangame is made by me. Paulor94.

Upgraded from Scratch version to Unity version. Enjoy.

Fun fact: Only some few scripts are borrowed from the first original game that released on Gamejolt. You can probably tell why the gameplay looks familiar to original but most of the scripts in the game are still made from scratch by me so yeah.

Credits:

Paulor94 - Main creator of this fangame

Notovia (Zaster) - Original creator of "I'm on observation duty"

Axl Gallais - His image on the laptop in the game

This game was made with a bunch of Unity free assets so most assets aren't belongs to me. All credits for the model go to their respective owners. (There's too many of them so I can't list them here. Sorry.)
